cause.description:
This 13 year old agency began in response to a community development project that discovered that in order to support the community through employment and housing opportunities, the community had to to be able to read, write, and work.
Literacy Works was formed to take on this tremendous task of helping adults and their families achieve self-sufficiency.
For more info go to www.literacy-works.org
If you know anyone who may need our help please call 225-923-3121.
1. Everyone, no matter what age, can be taught to read and write.
2. Everyone, no matter how old, has the right to learn to read, write, and function in their daily lives.
cause.mission: To improve the quality of life of adults by providing basic reading, writing, and life skills.
cause.name: Literacy Works
